thread.title: Travis Scott, Quavo & Lil Uzi Vert Reportedly Recording "Fast & Furious 8" Theme Song
thread.title_full: Travis Scott, Quavo & Lil Uzi Vert Reportedly Recording "Fast & Furious 8" Theme Song

author: Kevin Goddard
title: Travis Scott, Quavo & Lil Uzi Vert Reportedly Recording "Fast & Furious 8" Theme Song

organizations.name: quavo & lil uzi vert reportedly recording

text:
Home > Music > Travis Scott, Quavo & Lil Uzi Vert Reportedly Recording "Fast & Furious 8" Theme Song Travis Scott, Quavo & Lil Uzi Vert Reportedly Recording "Fast & Furious 8" Theme Song 0 0 3 Posted by Kevin Goddard , Jan 18, 2017 at 09:58pm Reports indicate that Travis Scott, Lil Uzi Vert & Quavo are handling the upcoming "Fast & Furious" theme song. 
Looking to follow up the success of Wiz Khalifa & Charlie Puth’s “See You Again” smash, it looks like rappers Quavo, Travis Scott & Lil Uzi Vert will be taking care of the upcoming theme song for the 8th installment in the Fast & Furious series according to songwriter Breyan Isaac that is. 
In a new interview with Songwriter Universe , Breyan says the trio of rappers will be doing the movie’s theme song, and it should be dropping in March, a few weeks before the movie comes out in April. 
“There’s a song coming out with Lil Uzi Vert, Travis Scott and Quavo (from the group, Migos ) that’s going to be the theme song for Fast & Furious 8,” Isaac told Songwriter Universe . “That will be a single out in March, or close to when the movie comes out in April.” While nothing is confirmed yet, the thought of these three laying down a charged & boisterous record seems pretty dope. We’ll keep you posted if any confirmation or further details are revealed.
